channel.title: meta-game on un01s notes
channel.description: Recent content in meta-game on un01s notes

item.title: meta-game
item.description: There are several things coming together recently. It’s time to present them together. The first thing is a tweet. Now it’s hard to retrieve it but the idea is below. “They’re like the “entrepreneurship” professor that never built a business. They’re experts in the meta-game – they’re polished speakers, engaging writers, and thought-leading tweeters. The problem, though, is that they’re not judged by customers, the market, or nature, instead they’re judged by their peers.
